verses.text: On the holy mountain stands the city he founded.
The \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*loves the gates of Zion more than all the dwellings of Jacob.
Glorious things he is speaking of you, you city of God. \+w Selah|strong="H5542"\+w*
“Among those who are mine I name Rahab and Babylon, Philistia, Tyre, Ethiopia, their people will say I was born in Zion.
As for Zion it will be said each and all were born in her.” The Lordwill preserve her.
The \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*will count, when enrolling the peoples, “This one was born there, and that one was born there.” \+w Selah|strong="H5542"\+w*
Singers and dancers alike will say “All my springs are in you.”
